channel.title: [317][Delta] How to make it if someone wears an item
channel.description: How do you make it if someone wields a cape they can't attack people with that same cape. I am making a custom minigame sort of like castle wars but a bit different. -Fmcb

item.title: [317][Delta] How to make it if someone wears an item
item.dc:creator: @fmcb fmcb
item.description:
@fmcb wrote:

didnt work anyone know how to do on deltA?

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta] How to make it if someone wears an item
item.dc:creator: @Burning_fangs Burning fangs
item.description:
@Burning_fangs wrote:

look for something that says if(incombat()) {…
then copy the part below that and change it to if(playerequip[playercape]== XX && attacking.playerequip[playercape] == xx) {

the actual methods will prob be different on delta, but hopefully it’s something like that.

Read full topic
